entry.title: Enterprise-Grade Ransomware Protection
entry.summary: Right-Sized for Your Business We bring the power of SentinelOne AI security to companies with 5 to 50 employees—fully managed, monitored, and supported by our experts. You run your business; we stop the hackers. Get Your Free Security Assessment You might think your business is…
entry.content:
Right-Sized for Your Business

We bring the power of SentinelOne AI security to companies with 5 to 50 employees—fully managed, monitored, and supported by our experts. You run your business; we stop the hackers.

 

Get Your Free Security Assessment

 

Small Business, Big Target

You might think your business is too small to be targeted by cybercriminals. The data says otherwise. Ransomware attacks are automated, looking for any open door.

If you don’t have a full-time Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) or a 24/7 Security Operations Center, you are vulnerable. Antivirus is no longer enough. You need AI-driven defense.

Powered by SentinelOne

We do not rely on generic antivirus. We partner with SentinelOne, the world leader in AI-powered Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR).

  • Stops Attacks Before They Start: Uses Artificial Intelligence to identify malicious behavior, not just known viruses.

  • Ransomware Rollback: In the unlikely event of an infection, the system can reverse the encryption and restore your files with one click.

  • Lightweight: No more slowing down your laptops. It runs silently in the background.

We Don't Just Resell; We Protect.

Buying the software is only half the battle. Configuring it, monitoring it, and knowing what to do when an alarm goes off is the hard part. That is where we come in. We act as your outsourced security department.

The "Managed Shield" Plan

Fo businesses that want "set it and forget it" peace of mind.

We take the complexity out of cyber defense.

  • Full Deployment: We install the agents on all your workstations (Mac, Windows, Linux) and servers.

  • Policy Configuration: We tune the settings to ensure maximum security without interrupting your workflow.

  • Operational Supervision: We monitor the console. If the system flags a false positive, we clear it. If it flags a threat, we ensure the system blocked it.

  • Remote Technical Support: Having trouble with the agent? Need to add a new employee? We handle the administration remotely.

The "Total Response" Plan

For businesses handling sensitive data (Finance, Legal, Health) that need an immediate human response.

Includes everything in the "Managed Shield" Plan, PLUS:

  • Instant Human Incident Response: If a breach is attempted, our senior security analysts jump in immediately to isolate the machine and neutralize the threat manually if the AI requires assistance.

  • Direct Advisory Hotline: Have a suspicious email? Worried about a new type of hack in the news? You get direct access to our experts for advice.

  • Quarterly Security Review: We review your threat landscape and advise on improvements to your overall security posture.
 

 

Compare Your Options

 

Feature Managed Shield  Total Response
SentinelOne Enterprise License ✅ ✅
Expert Installation & Setup ✅ ✅
Policy Tuning & Whitelisting ✅ ✅
Operational Supervision ✅ ✅
Remote Admin Support ✅ ✅
Instant Human Incident Response ❌ Priority Access
Security Advisory Services ❌ ✅
Threat Hunting Automated Automated + Human

 

Why Choose Us?

 

Large Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) ignore companies with under 50 seats. We are dedicated to you.

  1. We speak human, not geek. We explain risks in plain English.

  2. We are fast. When it comes to security, seconds matter.

  3. We are affordable. We bundle our volume licenses to give you enterprise pricing you couldn't get on your own.

 

Ready to secure your workforce?

 

Step 1: Contact us for a quote (based on number of devices). Step 2: We deploy remotely (no site visit needed). Step 3: You are protected instantly.

 

Protect My Business Now
